@description.name: @description
@description
@description.body:
Adds a route handler for the given channel. The route is called
if the {@link #emit} method finds a match.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: channel {String} The channel of the message.
@param.description: The channel of the message.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: type {String|RegExp} The type, used for checking if the executed path matches.
@param.description: The type, used for checking if the executed path matches.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: handler {Function} The handler to call if the route matches the executed path.
@param.description: The handler to call if the route matches the executed path.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: scope {var ? null} The scope of the handler.
@param.description: The scope of the handler.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} The id of the route used to remove the route.
@return.description: The id of the route used to remove the route.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Adds a handler for the "any" channel. The "any" channel is called
before all other channels.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: type {String|RegExp} The route, used for checking if the executed path matches
@param.description: The route, used for checking if the executed path matches

@param.name: @param
@param.body: handler {Function} The handler to call if the route matches the executed path
@param.description: The handler to call if the route matches the executed path

@param.name: @param
@param.body: scope {var ? null} The scope of the handler.
@param.description: The scope of the handler.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} The id of the route used to remove the route.
@return.description: The id of the route used to remove the route.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds a listener for a certain channel.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: channel {String} The channel the route should be registered for
@param.description: The channel the route should be registered for

@param.name: @param
@param.body: type {String|RegExp} The type, used for checking if the executed path matches
@param.description: The type, used for checking if the executed path matches

@param.name: @param
@param.body: handler {Function} The handler to call if the route matches the executed path
@param.description: The handler to call if the route matches the executed path

@param.name: @param
@param.body: scope {var ? null} The scope of the handler.
@param.description: The scope of the handler.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} The id of the route used to remove the route.
@return.description: The id of the route used to remove the route.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Removes a registered listener by the given id.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: id {String} The id of the registered listener.
@param.description: The id of the registered listener.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Checks if a listener is registered for the given path in the given channel.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: channel {String} The channel of the message.
@param.description: The channel of the message.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: path {String} The path to check.
@param.description: The path to check.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sends a message on the given channel and informs all matching route handlers.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: channel {String} The channel of the message.
@param.description: The channel of the message.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: path {String} The path to execute
@param.description: The path to execute

@param.name: @param
@param.body: params {Map} The given parameters that should be propagated
@param.description: The given parameters that should be propagated

@param.name: @param
@param.body: customData {var} The given custom data that should be propagated
@param.description: The given custom data that should be propagated

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Executes a certain channel with a given path. Informs all
route handlers that match with the path.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: channel {String} The channel to execute.
@param.description: The channel to execute.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: path {String} The path to check
@param.description: The path to check

@param.name: @param
@param.body: params {Map} The given parameters that should be propagated
@param.description: The given parameters that should be propagated

@param.name: @param
@param.body: customData {var} The given custom data that should be propagated
@param.description: The given custom data that should be propagated

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Executes all given listener for a certain channel. Checks all listeners if they match
with the given path and executes the stored handler of the matching route.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: channel {String} The channel to execute.
@param.description: The channel to execute.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: path {String} The path to check
@param.description: The path to check

@param.name: @param
@param.body: listeners {Map[]} All routes to test and execute.
@param.description: All routes to test and execute.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: params {Map} The given parameters that should be propagated
@param.description: The given parameters that should be propagated

@param.name: @param
@param.body: customData {var} The given custom data that should be propagated
@param.description: The given custom data that should be propagated

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} Whether the route has been executed
@return.description: Whether the route has been executed

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Executes a certain listener. Checks if the listener matches the given path and
executes the stored handler of the route.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: channel {String} The channel to execute.
@param.description: The channel to execute.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: path {String} The path to check
@param.description: The path to check

@param.name: @param
@param.body: listener {Map} The route data.
@param.description: The route data.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: params {Map} The given parameters that should be propagated
@param.description: The given parameters that should be propagated

@param.name: @param
@param.body: customData {var} The given custom data that should be propagated
@param.description: The given custom data that should be propagated

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} Whether the route has been executed
@return.description: Whether the route has been executed
